title: PBE SIgnup not working
body:
I really want to sign up for the Public Beta Enviorment, but when i hit the "I Want to Help!" button, it gives me Error 500 Something has gone hextechnically wrong, i have tried clearing my cache and cookies, using a vpn such as Hotspot Shield, abd CyberGhost neither showing and signs of progress

Please help it would be greatly appreciated! :)

replies.body: This is an issue that we're currently gathering reports on and investigating.  Specifically, this error 500 message when reaching the pbe page.  Grab a screenshot and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Thanks for your help!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cmI3G5ZX,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-21T23:40:00.062+0000)
>
> This is an issue that we're currently gathering reports on and investigating.  Specifically, this error 500 message when reaching the pbe page.  Grab a screenshot and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Thanks for your help!

What specifically do you want screenshots of? Just the webpage?
The webpage is good, but specifically the URL bar!  Thanks for your help!
Same here, i tried multiple devices such as another pc,androind,apple and none of them worked for me.
